Ebbro 43113 Toyota Supra (JZA80) 2000 JGTC Series GT500 Class 5th Place H. Takeuchi/Y. Tachikawa

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: http://www.ebbro.jp/SHOP/43113.html

Hironori Takeuchi & Yuji Tachikawa raced for Toyota Team Cerumo in the 2000 JGTC Series. Their only win was in round 7 at TI Circuit Aida (now known as Okayama International Circuit) and they finished 5th overall in the GT500 class. Takeuchi & Tachikawa would go on to win the championship in 2001.
